body:
You've seen the **[NBA Predictions Model](https://www.betrefinery.com/nba-betting/nba-predictions)**, now it's time to feast on our **Free NCAAB Picks**. One of our business partners is an elite statitician that has been a professional sports bettor for over 10 years. He's a jet. And so are his models. We'll expand on the data sources, variables and logic (without giving away the exact recipe) in a few weeks. But for now, enjoy free NCAAB picks that shouldn't be free. - - - ## **Today's Free NCAAB Picks** Excuse the raw formatting. We'll have these automated and pretty as soon as possible. ![free ncaab picks](/images/uploads/ncaa-free-picks-jan-2-1.png "free ncaab picks") ![free ncaab picks](/images/uploads/ncaa-free-picks-jan-2-2.png "free ncaab picks") ![free ncaab picks](/images/uploads/ncaab-free-picks.png "free ncaab picks") - - -
- - - ### **Want more insight? Get the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ###
title: Free NCAAB Picks: Your NEW Sports Betting Model
